entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 6:40 PM AST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
